AuthController - Class in com.dzieger.controllers
************************ Authentication Controller ************************ This controller is responsible for handling all authentication requests such as: - Login - Refreshing a token - Logging out - Registering a new user The controller uses the AuthService to handle the business logic for these requests.

AuthService - Class in com.dzieger.services
****************************** Auth Service ******************************* The authService handles all authentication business logic such as: - Login - Refreshing a token - Logging out - Registering a new user The service uses the JwtUtil to generate and validate JWT tokens.
